name: The Ones I Couldn't Save
description:
You are the keeper of space light station near a planet. When the planet starts blowing up, you receive 5 distress signals asking you to warp their ship to safety.

The 5 signals are broadcasted at the same time : You can only listen to one signal at a time. You will have to switch between the channels as the story unfolds.

In the end, you will have to make a difficult choice, for you can only save a single ship.
